'''2.2.911''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), '''2.2.910''' ([[wikipedia:MacOS|macOS]]), or '''2.2.909''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]) is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on December 8, 2020.

== Additions ==
* Added Account migration FAQ
* Added Open game directory button to ''Minecraft: Java Edition'' installations
* Added disclaimer toast about account migration login screen

[[File:Disclaimer toast from Launcher 2.2.911.png|thumb|297x297px|An Early version of the Migration toast. This could be enabled by setting "eligibleForMigration" to "true" on a Microsoft Account, in the launcher_accounts.json file.]]

== Changes ==
* Default "Modded" checkbox to checked
* Various accessibility fixes for dialogs throughout the launcher

== Fixes ==
* Fixed issue with adding new users to the launcher
* Fixed issue with opening directories on macOS
* {{bug|MCL-15921}} – Cannot scroll in Installation Editing
